title: sekurit and sigla glass 1952-67 brand new

posts.content:
darren557 wrote: ↑Mon Oct 26, 2015 2:52 pm new glass with correct logos for Barndoor buses and later buses these have been copied from original pieces and then have the logo put on to suit! This is all 5mm toughened. I have at present front windscreen cab door glass pop out and fixed side the only rear glass I have is for a deluxe but will be having the others made. I have had a set fitted in a 57 and tried them in a 54. Prices will range from £35-70 per piece. I now have barndoor safari glass and the piano hinge glass along with standard rear window and deluxe. Also doing sigla logo and have the none hole slider but this will be toughened not laminated.
I’ve got a 1963 6 pop outs 2 safaris have you got something
